Option.Name: Primitive Nerves
Option.Description: Add [SETBACK][SETBACK] to Coercion checks targeting Tognath characters.

Option.Name: Atmospheric Requirement
Option.Description: Tognaths must wear a specialized mask or breathing apparatus to breathe outside their native atmostphere. Tognath characters start the game with a breath mask and treat oxygen as a corrosive atmosphere with rating 5 (see the Envornmental Effects section of [b]Chapter VI: Conflict and Combat[b] in any of the Star Wars Roleplaying Core Rulebooks). However, they can survive in vacuum for up to five minutes before suffering its effects.

Option.Name: Special Abilities
Option.Description: Cybernetic implants and specialized lenses for thier compound eyes grant Tognath characters one free rank each in Coordination and Perception. They may not train either skill beyond rank 2 at character creation. This set of cybernetics counts as 1 implant against a Tognath's limit on cybernetic implants.
